metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000246 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: Python package pysaml2 version 4.4.0 and earlier reuses the initializationvector across encryptions in the IDP server, resulting in weak encryptionof data.

criterions.comment: python-pysaml2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
